newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Argentine Christmas lunch ends in street killing.
newsitem.headline: Argentine Christmas lunch ends in street killing.

text.p: Christmas spirits boiled over when an Argentine gunned down his lover's daughter and wounded her son at a family get-together in the town of Jesus Maria.
The three were digesting their traditional Christmas lunch in the small town 30 miles (50 km) from Buenos Aires when an argument broke out, the state news agency Telam reported.

The unseasonal quarrel became so heated that the three rushed out on the street, where Antonio Toribio Saavedra, 60, shot his lover's 16-year-old daughter in the neck, killing her. Saavedra, a casual labourer, ran away but later turned himself in to police.
